ValidationRule.description: Civility, FirstName, LastName and at least Email or Phone are required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Salutation, '' ) || ISBLANK( LastName ) || ISBLANK( FirstName ) || ( ISBLANK( PersonEmail ) && ISBLANK( Phone ) && ISBLANK( PersonHomePhone ) && ISBLANK( PersonMobilePhone ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Civility, FirstName, LastName and at least Email or Phone Fields are required
